body:
Back to youtube, wooo new video hub.

I'll post all my new videos here as long as they're not recorded on other MC servers.

replies.body:
Porky is alright in this situation, it's another game entirely.
The only thing that you can't do is advertise your own videos from other Minecraft servers on the forums.
That's why multiple video hubs have been locked/edited.
replies.body_tagged:
Porky is alright in this situation, it's another game entirely.

That's why multiple video hubs have been locked/edited.
